verses:
The law of the Lord is perfect,
refreshing my soul.
The word of the Lord is sure,
revealing His wisdom.

The standards of the Lord are
right, bestowing great joy.
The command of the Lord is pure,
directing my way.

May the words that I speak aloud,
And my mind's secret whisperings
Be according to your will, O Lord,
My Rock and my Redeemer.
chorus:
More to be desired
are they than gold,
Yea, than much fine gold:
Sweeter also than honey,
and the honeycomb.
